scripts.installDependencies: npm i && cd tools && npm i && cd .. && cd backend && npm i && cd .. && cd ui && npm i && cd .. && cd process && npm i
scripts.ui: cd ui && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.main: cd backend && npm run build && cd .. && cd process && npm run build && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run installDependencies && cd ui && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build && cd ../process && npm run build
scripts.buildWindowsApp: npm run build && npx rimraf dist && cd tools && npm run build-win
scripts.buildMacApp: npm run build && npx rimraf dist && cd tools && npm run build-mac
scripts.buildLinuxApp: npm run build && npx rimraf dist && cd tools && npm run build-linux
